name: Our Shit
description:
Our Shit: A pile of shit things that joined us together

You play as Bri, a girl that just broke up with her girlfriend Amy, oh, and you are an absolute maniac.  Your mission here is to erase her from all the things that joined you together by painting over, editing, rewritting or deleting whatever is necessary to forget her.

CONTROLS:

  • Left click to interact
  • Left click to paint over
  • Right click to erase
  • Alt+Click to use color picker

WHO IS RESPONSIBLE OF THIS THING:

A team formed by Alba Romero and Gabriel Ramiro, named RMTeam.

The game was made in two days for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

We also used the following fonts:

  • Rainy Hearts by Camellina
  • Mario64 by BunnyWhip

HOW DID YOU DO THAT:

Using Unity, Photoshop, Audacity and PaintToolSai.
